criterion: Provides accurate and relevant ICD-10 code for Ms. Marshall's stable coronary artery disease
Includes a CPT code for the treadmill stress test administered during the visit
Fails to include an Evaluation & Management code for the visit
Provides a clear and concise explanation of the patient's condition and treatment plan
Uses medical terminology and jargon that is not easily understandable by a non-medical professional
Includes all necessary details for accurate coding and billing, such as the patient's age, sex, and diagnosis
Fails to ask for clarification on any unclear or ambiguous information in the patient's record
Provides a detailed explanation of the importance of aspirin therapy in Ms. Marshall's treatment plan
Incorrectly assigns a different Evaluation & Management code for the visit
